casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Percell WATKINS, Jr. No. 208P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 19, 2005. Daniel R. Pollitt, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Percell Watkins, Jr. Joel H. Brewer, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th day of April 2005 by Plaintiff for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 19th day of April 2005."
